document.full_text: playing on the manicured minefield at t.p.c. sawgrass in the second round of the players championship, david toms birdied six holes and bogeyed two for a tidy round of 68.
document.title: toms skips the pitfalls of t.p.c. sawgrass and grabs the lead
lines_and_colors: playing on the manicured minefield at t.p.c. sawgrass in the second round of the players championship, david toms birdied six holes and bogeyed two for a tidy round of 68.
